name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Frontend Developer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, specifically utilizing **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, **SCSS**, **RxJS**, and **ReactiveForms**. Proven expertise in developing Single Page Applications (SPAs) and implementing microfrontend architectures with **Module Federation** and Backend for Frontend (BFF) strategies. Strong command of CI/CD pipelines and version control using **Git**, **GitHub**, and **GitLab**.
Additionally, adept at working in Agile environments with a focus on Kanban methodologies and documentation using **Confluence**. Bringing a solid background in full stack development with technologies such as **JavaScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with experience in cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated ability in compliance-driven development within healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring alignment with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed interactive and high-performance frontend applications using **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, and **SCSS**, focusing on delivering seamless user experiences across single-page applications (SPA).
Implemented state management and reactive programming with **RxJS** and **ReactiveForms** to enhance application efficiency and responsiveness, improving load times by **30%**.
Utilized **Git**, **GitHub**, and **GitLab** to manage version control, collaborating in a distributed team environment with comprehensive CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes, achieving a **50% reduction** in deployment time.
Architected microfrontend solutions through **Module Federation** and **Microfrontends** strategies, enabling independent development and deployment of frontend modules across various teams.
Conducted thorough code reviews and maintained documentation using **Confluence**, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
Employed **Kanban** methodologies to enhance project management workflow and increase transparency within cross-functional teams, resulting in a **25% improvement** in sprint delivery timelines.
Created robust onboarding tools and documentation for new team members to facilitate smooth transitions and reduce ramp-up time to **2 weeks**.
Developed unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and functionality, utilizing industry standards and frameworks for testing, thus boosting application reliability by **20%**.

Developed high-performance web applications utilizing **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, and **SCSS**, ensuring a seamless user experience for financial platforms and tools.
Implemented **ReactiveForms** and state management with **RxJS** to optimize form handling and data flow within Single Page Applications (SPAs).
Collaborated on an agile team employing **Kanban** methodologies, facilitating continuous delivery and improvement through regular stand-ups and retrospectives.
Integrated **CI/CD pipelines** to automate testing and deployment, significantly reducing release time by **30%** and increasing application stability.
Participated in code reviews using **Git** and version control on **GitHub**/**GitLab**, enhancing code quality and promoting best practices across the development team.
Orchestrated the development of microfrontend architectures using **Module Federation** and **Monorepos**, allowing for scalable project organization and team collaboration.
Engaged in cross-team initiatives to refine backend-for-frontend (BFF) strategies, improving responsiveness and load times across various components of the application.

Utilized **Angular** (latest version) and **TypeScript** to architect and enhance responsive, SEO-friendly frontend applications, implementing **HTML5** and **SCSS** for rich user interfaces that comply with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
Employed **RxJS** and **ReactiveForms** for effective form handling and asynchronous data streams, improving user interactions and dynamic responsiveness in single-page applications (SPA).
Implemented **Microfrontends** and **Module Federation** strategies to enable scalable and maintainable code, facilitating efficient development workflows using **Monorepos**.
Collaborated with backend teams on **BFF** (Backend for Frontend) architectures to optimize data handling between frontend and backend services, ensuring seamless integration of diverse APIs.
Managed version control systems such as **Git**, with repositories hosted on **GitHub** and **GitLab**, adhering to CI/CD pipelines for smooth deployment processes and maintaining high code quality with consistent reviews.
Participated in project management using **Confluence** to document development processes, user stories, and sprint planning, following **Kanban** methodology to enhance team collaboration and productivity.
Contributed to development projects using **Node.js** (for server-side interaction) alongside **Angular**, ensuring a cohesive approach across the tech stack and streamlined frontend-backend communication.
